response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which holds immense value for us at $1,000,000. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its worth to you is estimated at $800,000, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial agreement. I kindly invite you to consider this offer and look forward to discussing the details with you soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 950000}
